record.description: They have put the University of Chicago back on the gridiron map. Winning Maroon team reviving old-time football days on the Midway. First row, left to right: Tom Kelley (end), Bill Runyan (quarterback), Adolph Schuessler (halfback), Jack Scruby (halfback), Bill Bosworth (halfback), Marvin Channon (halfback), John Womer (end), and Prescott Jordan (guard); second row: Hopkins (tackle), Stanley Marynowski (tackle), Tommy Flinn (quarterback), Bill Langley (end), Keith Hatter (halfback), Bib Shipway (quarterback), Bill Gillerlain (end), Ed Thompson (guard), Bob Lindahl (guard), John Webster (end), Ralph Balfanz (end), Dave LeFevre (end), Ned Bartlett (halfback), and Henry Cutter(end); third row: Rainwater Wells (end), John Baker (end), Merritt Bush (tackle), Clarence Wright (tackle), Captain Ellmore Patterson (center), Sam Whiteside (guard), Kyle Anderson (assistant coach), Jim Jones (center), Clark Shaughnessy (head coach), Ed Wolfenson (guard), Marchmont Schwartz and Sam Horwitz (assistant coaches), Earl Sappington (tackle), Julian Lopez (assistant coach), Bart Smith (halfback), Otto Strohmeier (assistant coach), Harmon Meigs (guard), Ewald Nyquist (fullback), Gordon Peterson (center), Harry Nacey (halfback), Jay Berwanger (halfback), Ed Cullen (quarterback), and Finwall.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Attached caption, archives stamp. Split in half and taped down middle of back side.
